biotools.summary: ConoDictor2 enables fast and accurate classification of conopeptides (the main bioactive component of cone snail venom) into superfamilies based on their amino acid sequence. Predictions are made using Hidden Markov Models and generalized profiles with algorithm improvements for an improved prediction and classification.

bioschemas.name: ConoDictor2
bioschemas.summary: ConoDictor2 enables fast and accurate classification of conopeptides (the main bioactive component of cone snail venom) into superfamilies based on their amino acid sequence. Predictions are made using Hidden Markov Models and generalized profiles with algorithm improvements for an improved prediction and classification.
